matchdetail.match_summary: Live: Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to bat.
matchdetail.toss_summary: Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to bat.

comments.text: Over 50. 2 runs. Bowler: Anrich Nortje. Sri Lanka: 10-225(rr 4.50)

OUT! Caught. Anrich Nortje to Akila Dananjaya. Back of a length, middle stump on the back foot pulling, mis-timed in the air uncontrolled to mid wicket, by Duminy. Akila is dismissed and Sri Lanka finish on 225 all out. Sri Lanka's openers failed to score any meaningful runs again leaving Sri Lanka 14-2, but the middle order steadied the ship thanks to a well controlled innings by Mendis. Ak Perera, PARP Perera and Udana all chipped in with 30's towards the end of the innings to help Sri Lanka to this under par score. The South African bowlers executed their plans well today with the pick of the bowlers being Imran Tahir who finsihed on 10-2-33, can their batsmen see them home?
Anrich Nortje to Akila Dananjaya. Slower ball back of a length, middle stump on the front foot pulling, missed to wicketkeeper for no runs, fielded by de Kock.
Anrich Nortje to Akila Dananjaya. Full toss, outside off stump on the front foot driving, to deep extra cover for 2 runs, fielded by van der Dussen.
